What's Next for FIT21? (A Consensus 2024 Recap) https://www.coindesk.com/opinion/2024/06/05/whats-next-for-fit21-a-consensus-2024-recap/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines F77HXC5HNVDOBJ4IAFRYO2QQBM Nikhilesh DeCoinDesk held its annual Consensus conference in Austin, Texas last week, where we heard from lawmakers and regulators, developers, company execs and all sorts of other people in and around this sector. One topic of discussion: the Financial Innovation and Technology for the 21st Century Act. Its passage through the House sent a surge of excitement through the crypto industry as a sign of progress, even if it's not likely to become law just yet.
